item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hour series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different restaurant and bar scenes in Providence.

This week's location is: Bravo Brasserie on Empire St. in downtown Providence

Bravo is located on the corner of Empire and Washington streets, across from Trinity Rep. Its the place with all the twinkly white lights and a perfect place to get into the holiday mood! Its relaxed and casual with a very distinctive Parisian flair. Perfect for a Monday night! So, let's check it out!

Hope to see you there! Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...Nothing ever cancels Monday Happy Hours. Ever.

*Bring a friend*
item.how_to_find_us: I'll be wearing a silver scarf!
item.name: Monday Night Happy Hour - Bravo!
